opis: A compact and discreet loudspeaker that won’t draw attention to itself - at least, not until it starts performing. If you want a small, easy-to-position speaker that sounds way bigger than it looks, this bookshelf model fits the bill (and your space) perfectly.

Boasting room-filling sound with its 100mm (4 in) and 22mm (0.9 in) precision drivers, focussing on power-to-size ratio, the crossover has been revised to take advantage of a larger cabinet volume to enhance sensitivity and bass extension.

If you want scale in your sound but not in the size of your loudspeaker cabinet, you want the new 3020c standmount. It’s ready and able to let you experience all the power and dynamism of your favourite music, but without dominating your living space.

The Q 3020i is a bookshelf or stand mount speaker from Q Acoustics core loudspeaker offering, designed to deliver beautiful sound into your home, using the latest technological enhancements applied to the full 3000i series.

Q Acoustics 3030i bookshelf speaker is the latest addition to the Award-winning 3000i speaker range. Designed to deliver the biggest, most commanding sound ever achieved by a speaker of this type and price.

Small enough to keep a low profile, but with sound big and accomplished enough to draw attention to itself. If you want off-the-scale performance from a discreet, compact and easy-to-position loudspeaker, the 5010 bookshelf speaker fits the bill as nicely as it fits your space.

Experience all the scale and power of your favourite music without letting your loudspeaker dominate your room. The 5020 standmounting speaker will put your right in the heart of the music without putting itself at the heart of your space.
Taking acoustic technology and design cues from the flagship Concept 300, while also introducing new audio innovations, the Concept 30 standmount delivers truly high-end home audio performance.

The idea for the Concept 300 is simple, yet staggeringly ambitious. Built on the success of the floorstanding Concept 500 and delivering a stand mounting alternative that is more affordable without compromising performance and style

specifikacije.Dimensions W/H/D: 355 x 200 x 400 mm (14 x 7.9 x 15.7 in) cabinet

opis: The Q 3050i speakers boast a range of unique technologies including HPE™ and P2P™ to ensure these floorstanding speakers deliver a truly exceptional sound.

5040 is a notably compact floorstander with a modest footprint - which means it’s ideal for those environments where space is at a premium but the desire for full-scale audio excitement (as well a visual gratification) is strong.

specifikacije.Dimensions (per loudspeaker / H×W×D): Inc spikes and stabiliser: 967 × 361 × 293 mm (38.1 × 14.2 × 11.5 in)

opis: Where sheer scale, widescreen sound-staging and complete audio-fidelity are concerned, the 5050 outperforms its nominal competition with ease. If you have a bigger space to fill with the most beautifully and accurately reproduced sound, the 5050 floorstander is the speaker you need. Supplied with magnetically fixed gri

A sonic step-up from the Concept 30, this elegant floorstander takes everything great about its standmount brother but delivers more powerful audio, a deeper soundstage and increased bass extension through its leading-edge, low resonance cabinet.

The top-of-the-range Concept speaker, this high-end floorstander is designed to appeal to discerning audiophiles. The Concept 500 achieves a perfect balance between art and science. It is a loudspeaker that is at once, stylish, contemporary, exquisite-sounding and astonishingly accurate,

Smaller rooms with smaller speakers still deserve big, well-controlled bass for listening to music or watching movies. The Q SUB80 with its 8in driver is the ideal partner for M20 or M40 active speakers or 3000c and 5000 Cinema Packs in ones or twos.

No matter if it’s a stereo set-up or full-on surround-sound cinema system, the Q SUB120 can fill your listening room with that infra-bass Low Frequency Effect you can feel as well as hear. Big room with big speakers? No problem.

A bigger space demands bigger bass - and that’s exactly what the Q SUB100 provides. Its 10in driver and effortless performance make it the perfect low-frequency partner for our Concept loudspeakers, as well as every other medium-sized passive speaker in our line-up.
This powerful, 140watts rms, twin 170mm drive unit subwoofer will bring the full explosive majesty of blockbuster movie soundtracks into your living room.
Utilizing the technology that the rest of the 3000i series boasts, the Q 3060S slimline subwoofer is as powerful as it is attractive.

At the heart of a Concept 5.1 home cinema set-up, the Concept 90 is our most high-performance centre channel speaker yet. Able to deliver astonishingly dynamic and ultra-clear dialogue, this speaker is the star of the Concept home cinema range.

Designed to project dialogue ahead of even the most full-on Hollywood action movie soundtrack, and to deliver all the subtlety and nuance of art-house favourites with equal ease and conviction. Put the 5090 at the centre of your home cinema system and get the complete picture.

The Q 3090Ci Centre Speaker delivers an immersive home cinema experience with precision twin 100mm (4") and 22mm (0.9") drivers, ensuring exceptional detail in every word and sound. Q Acoustics Concept 300 Speakers’ Tensegrity Stands redefine the relationship between the speaker and the stand by using a completely new design

ime_proizvoda: Tensegrity Speaker Stand Pair with Universal Adapter Plate
opis: Q Acoustics Tensegrity Speaker Stands redefine the relationship between the speaker and the stand by using a completely new design and it is now suitable for other brands with a universal adapter plate.

Inspired by the ground-breaking Tensegrity stand developed by Q Acoustics for its high-end Concept 300 loudspeaker, the stand minimises resonance from the floor to the speaker cabinet (and vice-versa) thanks to its remarkable low-mass, low-reflectivity design

opis: Engineered to elevate your 3030i and 3030c speakers, the 3030FSi Floor Stands feature a robust triple-upright architecture with acoustically damped columns that minimize vibration and enhance sonic clarity.
